# UITableViewCell.FocusStyle.default

**Case**

The cell alters its appearance in a standard, system-defined way when it becomes focused.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Discussion

This focus style is the default.

## Constants

- **UITableViewCell.FocusStyle.custom**: The cell doesn’t alter its appearance automatically when it becomes focused.
